Package UTILITY

package UTILITY
  • Class
    Description
    AtomManager
    The AtomManager class creates and manages atoms on the board.
    EdgeManager
    EdgeManager initializes and manages a list of edges representing the outer edges of hexagonal board.
    GameLogic
     
    Main
     
    RayManager
    The RayManager class manages the trajectory of a ray as it traverses the board, interacts with atoms and edges, and updates the visual representation of entrance and exit edges on the game board accordingly.
    TrajectoryManager
    The TrajectoryManager class creates and manages all possible trajectories.
    TrajectoryName
     
    Utility
